subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Sarah Fisher has returned to racing Indy cars full-time for an unheralded Dreyer & Reinbold Racing team that includes Buddy Rice, Danica Patrick’s former teammate.
snippet: Sarah Fisher has returned to racing Indy cars full-time for an unheralded Dreyer & Reinbold Racing team that includes Buddy Rice, Danica Patrick’s former teammate.
